GR14krdipc_u:9: iṣṭa-devatā'nusmaraṇa-pūrvakaṃ maṅgalam āśīr-vyājena kṛtaṃ śiṣya-śikṣārtham ādau
GR14krdipc_u:15: gopī-jana-vallabho yuṣmākaṃ śriye sampade 'stu bhūyād iti yojanā /
GR14krdipc_u:17: tathā ca gopī-janasyaivāvijñāta-vinaya-prakarasyāpi vallabhaḥ kiṃ punaḥ sādhakasyāśeṣa-pūjā-vidhāna-kovidasyeti bhāvaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:18: yad vā gopī prakṛtir jano mahad-ādir anayor vallabhaḥ preraka ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:19: kīdṛśaḥ kalāyāṃ jñāna-svarūpe svasmin āttāyāḥ prāptāyā adhyastāyā māyāyā lavakena leśena vikṣepātma-svabhāvena āttā prāptā mūrtir yena sa tathoktaḥ
GR14krdipc_u:20: etena tasya śarīra-sambandhe 'pi na svarūpānusandhāna-pracyutir āvaraṇa-śakter aprāmāṇyād iti bhāvaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:24: athavā, saṃmohana-mantra-rūpakaṃ kāma-bījaṃ sakala-gopāla-mantrāṇāṃ bījam udāharati kaleti /
GR14krdipc_u:25: kaś ca laś ca kalau tābhyām attau gṛhītau sambaddhau māyā-lavakau caturtha-svarānusvārau tābhyām āttā svīkṛtā bīja-rūpā mūrtir yena saḥ tathoktaḥ kala ity atrākāra uccāraṇārthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:27: kalam avyaktaṃ madhuraṃ yathā syāt tathā kvaṇan śabdāyamānaḥ veṇur vaṃśaḥ kala-kvaṇaṃś cāsau veṇuś ceti kala-kvaṇad-veṇuḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:28: tasya ninādena ramyaḥ sarva-mukha-prada ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:30: hṛdi śritaḥ hṛt-paṅkaje sthitaḥ hṛdi dhyeya ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:31: yad vā sarva-prāṇināṃ hṛdaye 'ntaryāmi-rūpeṇa sthita ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:32: kiṃ kurvan / trayāṇāṃ lokānāṃ samāhāras trilokī /
GR14krdipc_u:33: trailokyaṃ vyākulayan kartavyeṣu vicāra-śūnyaṃ kurvan māyayā mohayann ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:37: atra laghu-dīpikā-kāraḥ kalātta-māyety-ādinā gopī-jana-vallabha ity anena ca bīja-sahito 'tra daśākṣaraḥ sūcitaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:39: trilokīṃ vyākulayann ity anena ca vaśyādi-prayogāḥ sūcitāḥ ity āha // KrdC_1.1 //
GR14krdipc_u:45: iha granthe śārṅga-pāṇeḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya yajana-vidhiṃ pūjāhomādikaraṇa-prakāraṃ vivicya vivecanaṃ kṛtvā kathayāmi āsamāpter vartamānatvāt /
GR14krdipc_u:48: etena svokteḥ svātantryaṃ nirākṛtam iti bhāvaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:49: kiṃ kṛtvā ? mūrdhnā mastakena mahitāḥ pūjitā ye rajaḥ-kaṇakā dhūli-leśās tān praṇamya kīdṛśān guru-caraṇa-dvayam eva padma-dvayaṃ tad-utthān tad-udbhavān /
GR14krdipc_u:51: tathā guru-dhyānaṃ śirasi kartavyam ity api sūcitam // KrdC_1.2 //
GR14krdipc_u:56: phalati hi kaścana kasyacit kathañcit // Krd_1.3 //
GR14krdipc_u:57: hi yataḥ manūnāṃ gopāla-mantra-vyatiriktānāṃ madhye kaścana mantrorāśyādinā śodhitaḥ
GR14krdipc_u:58: kṣiti-sura-prabhṛtīnāṃ varṇānāṃ madhye muni-vanavāsi-prabhṛtīnām āśramāṇāṃ cakārāt
GR14krdipc_u:59: strīṇāṃ madhye kasyacit kathaṃcij janasya bhāgya-vaśāj japa-homādibhir ādi-śabdena
GR14krdipc_u:62: hi śabdo 'trāvadhāraṇa iti kaścit kṣitisuro brāhmaṇaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:75: siddhādi-gaṇanānirapekṣa evaiṣa prathopasthito vakṣyamāṇa-daśākṣara-gopāla-mantro na tu gopāla-viṣayako mantra-gaṇo 'tiprasaṅgāt /
GR14krdipc_u:80: vāñchitānāṃ svābhimatānāṃ phalānāṃ drāg eva jhaṭity eva dātā keṣu sarveṣu varṇeṣu
GR14krdipc_u:81: brāhmaṇādiṣu sarvāśrameṣu brahmacāri-prabhṛtiṣu nārīṣu nānāhvaya-janmabheṣu nānā-prakāra-nāmasu
GR14krdipc_u:82: tahtā nānā-prakāra-janma-nakṣatreṣu stasv apīty arthaḥ // KrdC_1.4 //
GR14krdipc_u:83: evaṃ saty api guru-caraṇa-śuśrūṣā-paropasthitāya mantro deya iti vyanakti-
GR14krdipc_u:88: yasmān nūnaṃ niścitam acyuta-kaṭākṣa-pātena śrī-kṛṣṇa-kṛpāvalokane bhaktir añjasā
GR14krdipc_u:89: tattvataḥ kāraṇaṃ tatas tasmāt kāraṇāt tac catuṣṭaya-phalāptaye prasiddha-dharmādi-puruṣārtha-catuṣṭaya-rūpa-phala-prāpty-arthaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:90: harau viṣṇau gurau mantra-dātari ca bhakti-yukta-puruṣo dīkṣādāv adhikṛto 'dhikārī bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:91: etena guru-devatayor abhedena dhyānaṃ kartavyam iti sūcitam // KrdC_1.5 //
GR14krdipc_u:96: vāsīnaḥ sva-gurūn gaṇādhipam atho vandeta baddhāñjaliḥ // Krd_1.6 //

GR14krdipc_u:101: sa-pavitreti pavitra-sahitaḥ mudrā-yukta-hastaḥ supavitreti-pāṭhe atiśobhana-pavitreṇa mudritaḥ mudrā-sambaddho tilakenojjvalaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:103: atra prāg-vadanasya kaṇṭhoktatvāt prāg-vadanaṃ mukhyaṃ tad-asambhave tūdaṅmukhatvaṃ rātrau tu sarva-pūjāsvedodaṅmukhatvaṃ purāṇe ca tathaivābhidhānāt
GR14krdipc_u:104: anantaraṃ sudṛḍhaṃ yathā syāt tathā padmāsanaṃ svastikaṃ vā kṛtvā /
GR14krdipc_u:107: jānūrvor antare samyak kṛtvā pāda-tale ubhe /

GR14krdipc_u:110: atho śabdaś cārthe 'nukta-samuccayena tenāgre durgāṃ pṛṣṭhe kṣetra-pālaṃ vandeta tad uktaṃ gautamīye vāme guruṃ dakṣiṇato gaṇeśaṃ durgāṃ puraḥ kṣetrapatiṃ ca paścāt / iti /
GR14krdipc_u:116: atra śāradā-tilakokta-krameṇaitad boddhavyaṃ dakṣiṇe pūjā-dravya-sthāpanaṃ vāme jala-kumbha-sthāpanaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:117: pṛṣṭhe kara-prakṣālana-pātra-sthāpanaṃ purato dīpa-cāmarādy-upakaraṇa-sthāpanam iti // KrdC_1.6 //
GR14krdipc_u:123: tatas tad-anantaraṃ bhūtātmakaṃ pṛthivyādi-pañca-mahābhūtamayam etad aṅgaṃ śarīraṃ śuddha-matiḥ viśada-matiḥ viśodhayed devatātmakaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:126: kiṃ kṛtvā ? astra-mantreṇaiva astrāya phaḍ ity anena tan-mantrāṅgāstra-mantreṇaiva vā,
GR14krdipc_u:127: gandha-puṣpābhyāṃ hastau saṃśodhya kara-nyāsaṃ kṛtvāstra-mantreṇaivordhvordhvaṃ tāla-trayaṃ kuryāt /
GR14krdipc_u:128: tad uktaṃ śāradāyām-kara-nyāsaṃ samāsādya kuryāt tāla-trayaṃ tataḥ iti /
GR14krdipc_u:129: anantaram astra-mantreṇaiva choṭikayā daśa-dig-bandhanaṃ astra-mantreṇaiva vahni-prākāraṃ jalenātmanaḥ pariveṣṭana-rūpaṃ vidhāya kṛtvā /
GR14krdipc_u:130: atra sampradāyaḥ hṛt-padma-karṇikā-sthaṃ dīpa-śikhā-nibhaṃ jīvātmānaṃ haṃsa iti mantreṇa

GR14krdipc_u:141: pañca-bhūta-maya-deha-śoṣakaṃ tathā ca vāma-nāsā-puṭena vāyum ākarṣan ṣoḍaś-vāraṃ vāyu-bījaṃ japed iti bhāvaḥ /

GR14krdipc_u:144: catuḥ-ṣaṣṭhi-vāraṃ vāyu-bījaṃ kumbhakena japtvā khamaṇeḥ sūryasya mārgeṇa piṅgalayā
GR14krdipc_u:145: dakṣiṇa-nāsā-puṭena recanenaiva vāyu-bījaṃ dvātriṃśad-vāraṃ japan vāyuṃ vyāmuñcet
GR14krdipc_u:150: muñcet samīraṃ saha bhasmanā bahiḥ // Krd_1.9 //
GR14krdipc_u:151: tenaiva kha-maṇeḥ sūryasya mārgeṇa dakṣiṇa-nāsā-puṭena vilīnaḥ sambaddho māruto vāyur
GR14krdipc_u:152: yatra tad āśuśukṣaṇer vahner bījaṃ ram iti aruṇam aruṇa-varṇaṃ vicintya vāyunāpūrya
GR14krdipc_u:153: tad-bījasya ṣoḍaśa-vāra-japena pūrakaṃ kṛtvānantaraṃ kumbhakena caturguṇaṃ raṃ-bījaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:154: japan dehaṃ paridahya tad-ūrdhvaṃ ram iti dvātriṃśad-vāraṃ japan vāmata iḍā-mārgeṇa
GR14krdipc_u:155: vāma-nāsā-puṭena bhasmanā saha bahiḥ samīraṃ vāyuṃ muñced ity arthaḥ // KrdC_1.9 //

GR14krdipc_u:161: ṭasya paraṣ ṭa-paraḥ ṭha-kāras tam atīva śuddhaṃ śvetaṃ vidhuṃ candra-bīja-rūpam

GR14krdipc_u:163: nanu, sarva-śarīrasya dagdhatvāt katham amṛtāṃśu-pathena candra-bīja-nayanam iti cen, na /

GR14krdipc_u:166: mātṛkā-mayīm amṛta-samūha-vṛṣṭiṃ la-paro va-kāraḥ varuṇa-bījam iti yāvat taj-japena
GR14krdipc_u:167: kumbhakena catuḥ-ṣaṣṭhi-vāra-japena nipātya utpādya tathā mātṛkā-mayyā vṛṣṭyā idaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:169: kīdṛśam ? vapur vaktra-karāṅgaṃ vaktraṃ ca karaś ca aṅgam avayava-rūpaṃ

GR14krdipc_u:171: anantaraṃ dakṣiṇa-nāsā-puṭena vāyuṃ recayet lam iti pṛthvī-bījaṃ pīta-varṇaṃ dvātriṃśad-vāraṃ japan tat śarīraṃ sudṛṣṭaṃ cintayet /
GR14krdipc_u:172: tad-anu so 'ham ity ātma-mantreṇa brahma-randhrāj jīvaṃ hṛdayāmbhojam ānayed iti sampradāyaḥ // KrdC_1.10 //

GR14krdipc_u:191: varṇān hṛdayādi-sthāna-gatān atrāpi kara-pad-yugayor udara-vaktrayoś ca hṛdaya-pūrvaṃ yathā syāt tathā anvahaṃ pratidinaṃ nyasatu /
GR14krdipc_u:192: kara-pad-yugādīnāṃ pūrvaiḥ padaiḥ samastānām api hṛdaya-pūrvam iti kriyā-viśeṣaṇena saha sambandhaḥ sāpekṣatvād atrāsamāsa iti tu tulya-pradhāna-sāpekṣa-viṣayaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GR14krdipc_u:193: kim-arthaṃ śuddha-kalevara-siddhaye śuddha-śarīra-sampādanārtham ity arthaḥ // KrdC_1.11-12 //

GR14krdipc_u:203: ardha-kṣapeśena saha vartanta iti sārdha-kṣapeśāḥ ardha-candra-sahitāḥ taiḥ sānusvārair ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:204: sa-visargakaiḥ visarga-sahitaiḥ sobhayair anusvāra-visarga-sahitaiḥ vinyasya tathādau

GR14krdipc_u:206: mātṛkā-sthāneṣu aṃ nama ity ādīn kṣaṃ nama ity antān,

GR14krdipc_u:209: nanu, katham arṇa-śatārdhakenety ukta-varṇānām eka-pañcāśattvād ity ucyate kṣa-kāreṇākṣara-dvayasyaikī-karaṇāt /
GR14krdipc_u:213: vastutas tu arṇa-śatārdhaṃ ca ka cārṇa-śatārdhakaṃ tenākṣarāṇām eka-pañcāśattvm āyātam /
GR14krdipc_u:216: keśavaḥ puraḥsaraḥ prathamo yāsāṃ mūrtīnāṃ tāḥ tathā ca keśavādi-mūrti-sahitaiḥ kīrtyādi-śakti-yuktaiś
GR14krdipc_u:217: ca mātṛkākṣarair lalāṭādiṣūkta-sthāneṣu yathā-kramaṃ nyāsaḥ kāryaḥ // KrdC_1.13-14 //

GR14krdipc_u:228: cakrijaye gadidurge śārṅgī prabhayānvitas tathā khaḍgī /

GR14krdipc_u:250: sa-bindūn anantaraṃ mūrtīḥ keśavādyāḥ śaktīḥ kīrtyādyāḥ ṅe 'vasānāḥ ity ubhayena
GR14krdipc_u:251: sambadhyate tan na hṛdaya-grāhi prayāsatteḥ lāghavāc ca aṃ keśavāya kīrtyai nama
GR14krdipc_u:252: iti prayoge keśavāyety atra namaḥ-padasya yogābhāvāc caturthy-anupapattiḥ na hi viṣṇave

GR14krdipc_u:264: tathā ca aṃ keśava-kīrtibhyāṃ nama iti prayogaḥ mantram uktāvalī-kāra-laghu-dīpikā-kāra-tripāṭhi-rudropādhyāya-vidyādharācārya-paramānanda-bhaṭṭācārya-saṃmataḥ
GR14krdipc_u:265: aṃ keśavāya kīrtyai nama iti prayogaḥ padmapādācārya-prabhṛtīnāṃ saṃmata iti /

GR14krdipc_u:282: nānā-vidha-ratnena śobhito nānā bahu-prakāra ākalpo bhūṣaṇaṃ yasya /

GR14krdipc_u:312: prakāraṃ darśayati-maḥ pūrvo yasya sa ma-pūrvaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:315: tathā ca ma-kārādi-vyutkrameṇa ka-kāra-paryantam ekaikākṣaraṃ namaḥ-pada-sahitaṃ

GR14krdipc_u:317: ādvayaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ nāma dattvā anantaraṃ ātmane iti padaṃ dattvā anantaraṃ naty-antam

GR14krdipc_u:321: nyasatu matim ahaṅkāraṃ manaś ceti mantrī /
GR14krdipc_u:324: sakala-vapuṣi sarvāṅga-vyāpake jīvaṃ prāṇaṃ ca mantre āyojya tena nyasyatu tathā
GR14krdipc_u:325: ca maṃ namaḥ parāya jīvātmane namaḥ bhaṃ namaḥ parāya prāṇātmane namaḥ iti dvayaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:327: iti tattva-padaṃ dattvā maṃ namaḥ parāya jīva-tattvātmane namaḥ iti kecit tat-prayogān kurvanti tan na pramāṇābhāvāt mūrti-pañjara-nyāse 'pi mūrti-pada-prayogāpatteḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:329: madhye hṛdaye matim ahaṅkāraṃ manaś ca mantra āyojya tena mantrī nyasyatu tathā baṃ
GR14krdipc_u:330: namaḥ parāya mana ātmane namaḥ phaṃ namaḥ parāya ahaṅkārātmane namaḥ paṃ namaḥ parāya
GR14krdipc_u:331: mana ātmane namaḥ iti trayaṃ hṛdi vinyasyed ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:333: sthāneṣu śabda-pūrvaṃ guṇa-samudāyaṃ śabda-sparśa-rūpa-rasa-gandhātmakaṃ mantre āyojya tena nyasyatu tathā ca naṃ namaḥ parāya rūpātmane namaḥ iti hṛdaye,
GR14krdipc_u:334: thaṃ namaḥ parāya rasātmane namaḥ iti guhye,
GR14krdipc_u:335: taṃ namaḥ parāya gandhātmane namaḥ pādayor vinyasyed ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:337: sthitaṃ yathā syāt tathā nyasyatu tathā ca ṇaṃ namaḥ parāya śrotrātmane namaḥ iti
GR14krdipc_u:338: śrotrayoḥ ḍhaṃ namaḥ parāya tvag-ātmane namaḥ iti tvaci,
GR14krdipc_u:339: ḍaṃ namaḥ parāya dṛg-ātmane namaḥ iti netrayoḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:340: ṭhaṃ namaḥ parāya jihvātmane namaḥ iti jihvāyāṃ /
GR14krdipc_u:341: ṭaṃ namaḥ parāya ghrāṇātmane namaḥ iti ghrāṇayor iti vinyasyet // KrdC_1.29 //

GR14krdipc_u:348: tathā ca aṃ namaḥ parāya vāg-ātmane namaḥ iti mukhe /
GR14krdipc_u:349: jhaṃ namaḥ parāya pāṇy-ātmane namaḥ iti pāṇyoḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:350: jaṃ namaḥ parāya pādātmane namaḥ iti pādayoḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:351: chaṃ namaḥ parāya pāyv-ātmane namaḥ iti pāyau /
GR14krdipc_u:352: caṃ namaḥ parāya upasthātmane namaḥ ity upasthe vinyasyed ity arthaḥ /

GR14krdipc_u:354: tathā ca ṅaṃ namaḥ parāya ākāśātmane namaḥ iti śirasi /
GR14krdipc_u:355: dhaṃ namaḥ parāya vāyv-ātmane namaḥ iti mukhe /
GR14krdipc_u:356: gaṃ namaḥ parāyāgny-ātmane namaḥ iti hṛdaye
GR14krdipc_u:357: / khaṃ namaḥ parāya jalātmane namaḥ iti liṅge /
GR14krdipc_u:358: kaṃ namaḥ parāya pṛthivy-ātmane namaḥ iti pādayor nyasyed ity arthaḥ /

GR14krdipc_u:362: yato ya-kārād yo bhūta-varṇaḥ pañcama-varṇaḥ śa-kāraḥ vasu-varṇo 'ṣtamārṇo ha-kāraḥ

GR14krdipc_u:372: iti ṣa-kāraḥ rephasya upa samīpaṃ tena repha-samīpa-vartinau ya-kāra-la-kārau lakṣyete

GR14krdipc_u:436: kṛtīti kṛti-cchandaso viṃśaty-akṣaratvāt sahitam ekaṃ yatra tādṛśa-sapta-kṛti-vāram /

GR14krdipc_u:440: kaścit tu prathamaṃ sapta tato viṃśatis tata ekaṃ tato 'ṣṭāviṃśati-vāram abhyāsa-krameṇeti tātparyam āha tatra pramāṇaṃ sa eva praṣṭavyaḥ //
GR14krdipc_u:443: nāyacchet pavanaṃ susaṃyata-matis tv aṣṭau daśārṇena cet /

GR14krdipc_u:446: susaṃśita-matir vimala-buddhiḥ aṣṭāviṃśati-saṃkhyaṃ daśārṇaṃ daśākṣara-mantraṃ japan
GR14krdipc_u:447: prāyacchet prāṇāyāmaṃ kuryāt kīdṛśaṃ daśārṇam iṣṭa-phaladaṃ svābhimata-phaladaṃ tatra
GR14krdipc_u:449: aṣṭa-vāra-japena pūrakaṃ ṣoḍaśa-vāra-japena kumbhakaṃ kuryād iti guru-sampradāyaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:450: aṣṭādaśārṇe cet prāṇāyāmaḥ kriyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:451: tadā ravivāraṃ dvādaśa-vāram abhyasyan prāṇāyāmaṃ kuryād iti guru-sampradāyaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:453: tadā varṇānurūpaṃ mantra-varṇānāṃ tāratamyena japaṃ kurvan kuryāt /
GR14krdipc_u:454: atra svalpākṣarair mantrair bahu-vāram analpākṣarair mantraiḥ svalpa-vāraṃ japed ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:457: recakasya tyāgasya pūrvakarmaṇī pūraka-kumbhake tatra nipuṇā iti rudradharaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:458: tac cintyam evam api recake naipuṇyālābhāt prapañca-sārānusāriṇo 'sya granthasya śāradā-granthānuyāyitvāc ca // KrdC_1.38 //
GR14krdipc_u:464: dakṣiṇo vicakṣaṇaḥ puruṣaḥ dakṣayā dakṣiṇa-nāḍyā mārutaṃ vāyuṃ recayet tyajet tathā
GR14krdipc_u:465: vāmayā vāma-nāḍyā tyakta-vāyuṃ pūrayed madhyayā suṣumṇayā nāḍyā mārutaṃ vāyuṃ dhārayed
GR14krdipc_u:466: ity ukta-prakāreṇa recakādi-trayaṃ recaka-pūraka-kumbhakākhya-tritayam īritaṃ kathitaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:472: tatra kumbhaka-kāla evoktaḥ śvāsābhyāsa-krameṇa prāṇāyāma-saṅkhyayā mantra-japaḥ kāryo nirgama-prāṇāyāme tu recakādi-gaṇanā kāryety āhuḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:474: parva-traya-sparśa-kālaḥ kathyate vāma-hastena vāma-jānu-maṇḍalasya prādakṣiṇyena sparśa-kālaś ca /
GR14krdipc_u:475: yad atra rudropādhyāyair uktaṃ yadyapy atra recakaṃ prathamam uktaṃ tad-anantaraṃ pūrakaṃ tathāpi prathamaṃ pūrakam anantaraṃ kumbhakaṃ jñeyaṃ yato gṛhīta-ghṛtasya tyāgo bhavati /
GR14krdipc_u:476: yat punar vyatyāsena kathanaṃ tad-gopanāya evaṃ kalā-dantetyādy api vyatyāsena boddhavyam /
GR14krdipc_u:478: evaṃ ca gṛhīta-catur-guṇena dhāraṇaṃ tad-ardhena tyāga ity api darśitaṃ bhavatīti,
GR14krdipc_u:479: tan na prapañca-sārānusāriṇo granthasyāsya śāradānuyāyitvāt prapañca-sāre recakāditvasyaivoktatvāt pūrakāditvasyāṣṭāṅgayogāntarbhūta-prāṇāyāma-viṣayatvāt
GR14krdipc_u:480: yad uktaṃ gṛhītasya tyāgo bhavati tatrocyate svābhāvika-vāyu-dhāraṇasyātrāpi
GR14krdipc_u:482: yad uktaṃ vyatyāsena gopanārthaṃ kathanam iti tad ayuktam /
GR14krdipc_u:484: yad uktaṃ gṛhīta-caturguṇenaiva dhāraṇaṃ tad-ardhena tyāga iti tad apy ayuktaṃ pramāṇābhāvāt /
GR14krdipc_u:487: prāṇāyāmaḥ sa vijñeyas tarjanī-madhyame vinā // iti // KrdC_1.39 //
GR14krdipc_u:488: sanātanaḥ: tad eva krama-dīpikoktyā saṃvādayan tatraiva kiṃcid viśeṣaṃ ca darśayati-recayed iti /
GR14krdipc_u:500: prāṇāyāmaḥ sa vijñeyas tarjanī-madhyame vinā // iti /
GR14krdipc_u:501: tatra teṣu prāṇāyāmeṣu purvaṃ recakādiṣu saṅkhyoktā /
GR14krdipc_u:504: prakṛtam upasaṃharann ātma-yāgārthaṃ dehe pīṭha-kalpanāṃ darśayati-prāṇāyāmam ity ādinā /
GR14krdipc_u:505: prāṇāyāmaṃ vidhāyety atha nija-vapuṣā kalpayed yoga-pīṭham /
GR14krdipc_u:513: iti pūrvokta-prakāreṇa prāṇāyāmaṃ vidhāya kṛtvā athānantaraṃ nija-vapuṣā nija-śarīreṇa yāga-pīthaṃ pūjā-pīṭhaṃ kalpayet kalpanā-prakāram āha-nyasyed iti /
GR14krdipc_u:515: kamaṭhaḥ kūrmaḥ śeṣo 'nantaḥ kṣīra-sindhuḥ kṣīra-samudraḥ ratnena ujjvalaḥ mahito
GR14krdipc_u:516: yaḥ mahā-maṇḍapaḥ ratna-maṇḍapaḥ iti yāvat tathā cādhāra-śaktaye namaḥ prakṛtyai
GR14krdipc_u:517: nama iti navakaṃ nyased hṛdīty arthah /
GR14krdipc_u:519: pāda-gātrayoś catuṣṭayaṃ pāda-gātra-catuṣṭayam ity ubhayatra sambadhyate /
GR14krdipc_u:521: / aṃsa-dvayor udvaye ca dharmāya namaḥ dakṣiṇorau,
GR14krdipc_u:526: athānantaraṃ śeṣam anantam abjaṃ padmaṃ sūryendu-vahnīn sūrya-somāgni-maṇḍalāni /
GR14krdipc_u:528: avayavā a-kāro-kāra-ma-kārās tair yuktān sahitān tatrādau sa-bindu-praṇavāṃśādi-sāhityaṃ sampradāyato boddhavyam /
GR14krdipc_u:529: svādy-akṣaraiḥ sa-bindu-svīya-svīya-prathamākṣaraiḥ sahitāni sattva-rajas-tamāṃsi tathā ca hṛt-padme anantāya namaḥ,
GR14krdipc_u:538: jñānātmānam athāṣṭa-dikṣu parito madhye ca śaktīr nava /
GR14krdipc_u:539: nyastvā pīṭham anuṃ ca tatra vidhivat tat-karṇikā-madhyagaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:540: nityānanda-citi-prakāśam amṛtaṃ saṃcintayen nāma tat // Krd_1.42 //
GR14krdipc_u:548: etaiḥ saha jñānātmānaṃ bhuvaneśvarī-bīja-sahitaṃ hṛt-padme nyased iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:554: athānantaraṃ aṣṭa-dikṣu paritaḥ prādakṣiṇyena madhye ca karṇikāyāṃ nava-śaktīr vimalotkarṣiṇyādyā nyasyet /
GR14krdipc_u:565: etasyopari vakṣyamāṇaṃ pīṭha-mantraṃ-oṃ namo bhagavate viṣṇave sarva-bhūtātmane vāsudevāya sarvātma-saṃyoga-yaugapadya-pīṭhātmane namaḥ iti mantraṃ nyaset /
GR14krdipc_u:566: tad ukta-rūpe pīṭhe vidhivad gurūpadiṣṭa-mārgeṇa tat sarvopaniṣat-prasiddhaṃ dhāma brahma-caitanyaṃ cintayet /
GR14krdipc_u:576: prahvī satyā tatheśānā'nugrā navamī tathā // Krd_1.43 //
GR14krdipc_u:579: evaṃ hṛdayaṃ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarvānvitaś ca bhūtātmā /
GR14krdipc_u:580: ṅe 'ntāḥ sa-vāsudevāḥ sarvātma-yutaṃ ca saṃyogaṃ // Krd_1.44 //
GR14krdipc_u:581: yogāvadhaś ca padmaṃ pīṭhāt ṅe-yuto natiś cānte /
GR14krdipc_u:585: bhagavān iti ca viṣṇur iti ca sarvānvitaḥ sarva-pada-sahitaḥ bhūtātmā sarva-bhūtātmeti /
GR14krdipc_u:586: ete trayaḥ sa-vāsudevāḥ vāsudevena saha catvāraḥ pratyekaṃ ṅe 'ntāś caturthy-antāḥ kāryāḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:587: sarvātma-yutaś ca saṃyogaḥ sarvātma-saṃyoga iti svarūpaṃ yogāvadhau yoga-śabdānte padma-padmeti svarūpaṃ ṅe-yutaḥ pīṭhātmā caturthy-antaḥ pīṭhātmā etasyānte natir namaḥ-śabdaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:588: upasaṃharati pīṭheti ayaṃ pīṭha-mahā-manur uktaḥ kathitaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:589: kīdṛśaḥ ? saparyāsu pūjāsu paryāptaḥ samarthaḥ // KrdC_1.44-45 //
GR14krdipc_u:592: tataś ca bhagavān iti viṣṇur iti ca /
GR14krdipc_u:594: ete trayaḥ sa-vāsudevā vāsudeva-sahitāḥ pratyekaṃ ṅe 'ntāś caturthy-antāḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:595: tataś ca sarvātmanā yutaṃ saṃyogaṃ sarvātma-saṃyogam iti napuṃsakatvam ārṣam /
GR14krdipc_u:596: tataś ca yogasyāvadhau ante padmaṃ yoga-padmam iti /
GR14krdipc_u:599: evaṃ oṃ namo bhagavate viṣṇave sarva-bhūtātmane vāsudevāya sarvātma-saṃyoga-yoga-padma-pīṭhātmane nama iti siddham /
GR14krdipc_u:601: namo bhagavate brūyād viṣṇave ca padaṃ vadet /
GR14krdipc_u:604: pīṭhātmane hṛd-anto 'yaṃ mantras tārādir īritaḥ // iti /
GR14krdipc_u:606: oṃ namaḥ padam ābhāṣya tathā bhagavate-padam /
GR14krdipc_u:607: vāsudevāya ity uktvā sarvātmeti padaṃ tathā //
GR14krdipc_u:608: saṃyoga-yogety uktvā ca tathā pīṭhātmane padam /
GR14krdipc_u:615: varṇaiḥ paramaṃ jyotir anuttamaṃ hares tat // Krd_1.46 //
GR14krdipc_u:617: vyāpayyety ārabhya vidhiḥ samīritaḥ kare ity antaṃ vakṣyamāṇa-prakāreṇa mantra-varṇair
GR14krdipc_u:618: mantrātmakaṃ mantra-svarūpaṃ vidhāya kṛtvā ābhyāṃ karābhyāṃ sakalaṃ pūrvoktaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:621: yasmāt tan-mantra-varṇaṃ hareḥ kṛṣṇasya paramaṃ tejaḥ-svarūpam ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:622: kīdṛśaṃ ? punaḥ anuttamaṃ nāsty uttamaṃ yasmāt tathety arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:624: tathā ca tad hṛdaya-paṅkaja-sthaṃ harer anuttamaṃ jyotis tejaḥ sakalaṃ vidadhīta ṣaḍ-aṅga-nyāsena sāvayavaṃ kuryād iti laghu-dīpikā-kāraḥ //
GR14krdipc_u:627: karayor yugalaṃ vidhāyety ādinā sūcitaṃ mantram uddhartum ādau gopāla-mantreṣv api maulībhūtau daśākṣarāṣṭādaśākṣarau prathamaṃ saṃstauti-vakṣye manum iti /
GR14krdipc_u:633: kīdṛśaṃ ? tribhuvaneti tribhuvane trailokye prathitaḥ khyāto 'nubhāvaḥ prabhāvo yasya tathā tam /
GR14krdipc_u:637: akṣīṇeti akṣīṇaḥ sa-pūrṇaḥ puṇya-nicayaḥ sukṛta-samūho yeṣāṃ tathā taiḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:639: pakṣīti pakṣīndro garuḍaḥ sa eva ketuḥ cihnaṃ yasya sa pakṣīndra-ketuḥ śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ tad-viṣayaṃ tat-pratipādakam /
GR14krdipc_u:641: vastv iti vasu dhanaṃ tathā ca puruṣārtha-catuṣṭaya-pradam ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:650: abodheti abodho mithyā-jñāna-rūpaḥ sa eva tūla-pracayaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:651: tatra jvalano vahnir iva taṃ samastājñāna-nāśakam ity arthaḥ ?
GR14krdipc_u:657: viṣaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca apamṛtyur akāla-maraṇaṃ graho nava-graha-janitāniṣṭaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:658: rogo vāta-pittādi-janita-śarīra-dausthyam evam ādīnām aśubhādīnāṃ nivāraṇe eko 'dvitīyo
GR14krdipc_u:667: salila-plavane toyam antaraṇe sukha-santaraṇa-dātāraṃ saptir hayaḥ tathā ca manuṣyāṇāhayaratha-dvipādīnām upacaya-karaṃ tathā sutādi-pradam
GR14krdipc_u:672: balaṃ śarīra-sāmarthyaṃ vīryaṃ śukraṃ prabhāvo vā,
GR14krdipc_u:677: kāntir dīptiḥ pratibhā-svara-varṇa-kāntir ity ekapadaṃ tathā ca pratibhā-svara-varṇa-kāntir
GR14krdipc_u:678: dedīpyamāna-varṇa-śobheti kaścit subhagatvaṃ samasta-lokādarakatvam eteṣāṃ kartāraṃ
GR14krdipc_u:680: punaḥ kṣubhitā samohitāṇḍa-koṭir brahmāṇḍa-koṭir yena tathā taṃ saṃsāra-mohakam ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:683: atra jagati akhiladaṃ samastābhīṣṭa-pradam ity arthaḥ // KrdC_2.4 //
GR14krdipc_u:686: śūlī saurir bālo balānuja-dvayam athākṣara-catuṣṭayam // Krd_2.5 //
GR14krdipc_u:688: tad-dayitākṣara-yugmaṃ tad-uparigas tv evam uddharen mantram // Krd_2.6 //
GR14krdipc_u:689: śārṅgī ga-kāraḥ kīdṛśo 'yaṃ sottaradanta uttara-danta-paṅktau nyasyamānaḥ uttara-danta o-kāras tena sahita etena prathamākṣaram uddhṛtaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:691: kīdṛśo 'yaṃ vāmākṣi-yuk vāmākṣi caturtha-svaraḥ tena sahita etena dvitīyākṣaram uddhṛtam
GR14krdipc_u:692: akṣara-catuṣkaṃ krameṇa punaḥ kathyate śūlī ja-kāraḥ bālo ba-kāraḥ balānuja-dvayaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:693: saṃyukta-la-kāra-dvayaṃ lla iti svarūpam ity akṣara-catuṣkam uddhṛtam śūra-turīyaḥ
GR14krdipc_u:695: kīdṛśo 'yaṃ sānana-vṛttaḥ ānana-vṛttenākāreṇa saha vartate iti sānana-vṛttaḥ ayaṃ ca saptamaḥ syād mantrasya saptamo bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:697: tathā ca mantrasyāṣṭamo varṇo ya iti boddhavyaḥ /

GR14krdipc_u:701: prakāśito daśākṣaro manus tv ayaṃ madhu-dviṣaḥ /

GR14krdipc_u:710: amuṣya pūrvokta-mantrasya muniḥ ṛṣir nāradaḥ kīrtitaḥ kathitaḥ /

GR14krdipc_u:715: tathā vidhānāt prayogaś ca daśākṣara-gopāla-mantrasya nārada-ṛsaye namaḥ śirasi /
GR14krdipc_u:717: śrī-gopāla-kṛṣṇāya devatāyai namaḥ hṛdi ity evambhūtaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:719: evaṃ chando-devatayor api yojyam iti kecit // KrdC_2.8 //
GR14krdipc_u:729: amuṣya iha śāstre aṅgāni pañca kathitāni /
GR14krdipc_u:730: kāni tāni ? tatrāha hṛdaye natir iti /
GR14krdipc_u:731: hṛdaye natir namaḥ-padaṃ śirasi pāvaka-priyā svāheti sa-vaṣaṭ vaṣaṭ-pada-sahitā śikhety arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:732: hum api varmaṇi sthitaṃ varmaṇi kavace hum api padaṃ sthitam ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:733: sa-phaḍ astraṃ phaṭ-pada-sahitam astram ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:734: ity anena prakāreṇa sa-caturthi yathā syāt tathaivam aṅga-pañcakam uditaṃ kathitaṃ caturthyā ca hṛdayādīnāṃ yogaḥ kāryaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:736: kīdṛśaiḥ ? mukha-vṛtta-visūpapannair mukha-vṛttam ā-kāraḥ vi iti su iti svarūpam
GR14krdipc_u:737: etaiḥ pratyekam upapannaiḥ sambaddhaīh trailokya-rakṣaṇa-yujāpi trailokya-rakṣaṇaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:738: yunaktīti tad-yug etādṛśena cakreṇa api-śabdāc cakrair iti vibhidyānvayaḥ kāryaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:743: caturthī-yuktais tasyā eva prakṛtatvād etasyāpi padasya vibhidyānvayaḥ kāryaḥ dṛśor yadi iti yadi kvacin mantre dṛśor nyāso 'sti tadā tatra vauṣaḍ iti uditaṃ kathitam /
GR14krdipc_u:744: atra jvālā-cakrāyety api yojyam iti laghu-dīpikā-kāraḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:746: vi-cakrāya svāhā śirase svāhā su-cakrāya svāhā śikhāyai vaṣaṭ /
GR14krdipc_u:748: jvālā-cakrāya svāhā netra-dvayāya vauṣaṭ asurāntaka-cakrāya svāhā astrāya phaḍ iti
GR14krdipc_u:749: aṅgulīṣv aṅga-mantra-nyāse tu tat-tad-aṅga-mantrānte aṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ namaḥ tarjanībhyāṃ
GR14krdipc_u:751: āgamāntare hrīṃ aṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ namaḥ hrīṃ tarjanībhyāṃ svāhā /
GR14krdipc_u:752: tata ity ādi-darśanāt tenāṅguṣṭhādiṣu hṛdayāya namaḥ ity ādi-prayogāś cintyāḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:754: anye tu yathā-śrutāṅga-mantrasyaiva nyāsair aṅgulīṣv atideśān āhur ācyāryāḥ // KrdC_2.9-10 //
GR14krdipc_u:760: mantrārṇair mantrākṣarir namo 'ntaṃ yathā syād evam aṅgānāṃ daśakam udīritaṃ kathitaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:761: kīdṛśair upeta-candra-khaṇḍaiḥ sānusvāraiḥ sthānāny āhuḥ-hṛdayaṃ śīrṣaṃ mastakaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:762: tat-paścāt śikhā prasiddhā tanutraṃ kavacaṃ astraṃ daśa-dikṣu pārśva-yugala-kaṭi-pṛṣṭha-mūrdha-sahitaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:765: prayogas tu goṃ hṛdayāya nama iti pīṃ śirase svāhā ity ādi // KrdC_2.11 //
GR14krdipc_u:766: adhunāsya mantrasya bīja-śakty-adhiṣṭhātṛ-devatā-prakṛti-viniyogān darśayati vakṣya ity ādinā /
GR14krdipc_u:771: asya mantrasya pūrvoktasya sa-śakti-śakty-ādi-sahitaṃ bījaṃ vakṣye bījam āha-cakrīti ka-kāraḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:776: sa-pradyumnaḥ pradyumno binduḥ tat-sahitaḥ tathā cakrīm iti siddhaṃ bhavati /
GR14krdipc_u:778: ayam eva prādyumno mantra ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:786: kimbhūtaḥ ? medo va-kāraḥ vaktra-vṛttam ā-kāraḥ ābhyām upetaḥ sambaddhaḥ tathā pautrī ha-kāraḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:788: tathā ca svāheti siddham asau yugārṇo varṇa-dvayātmikā śaktiḥ proktā tatheyaṃ vahner vallabhā kimbhūtā kāmadā ākāṅkṣita-pradā /
GR14krdipc_u:789: kathambhūtasya vahner gīrvāṇa-vṛndair vandyasya sarvadeva-samūhaiḥ pūjyasya // KrdC_2.13 //
GR14krdipc_u:792: kṛṣṇaṃ prakṛtir ity ukto durgādhiṣṭhātṛ-devatā // Krd_2.14 //
GR14krdipc_u:793: asya mantrasya puruṣārtha-catuṣṭaya-sādhanāya viniyoga ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:794: prakṛtir mūla-kāraṇaṃ mantrotpādakaḥ mantra-svarūpa ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:797: gopāyeti sakalam idaṃ gopāyati paraṃ pumāṃsam iti gopī /
GR14krdipc_u:798: prakṛtes tasyā jātaṃ jana iti nadādikaṃ pṛthivy-antam // Krd_2.15 //
GR14krdipc_u:799: idaṃ sakalaṃ nāma-rūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtaṃ jagad gopāyati rakṣati tat-kāraṇatvāt svārthe āyaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:800: tathā paraṃ pumāṃsaṃ nitya-śuddha-buddham uktānandādvayātmakaṃ brahma-svarūpaṃ gopāyati
GR14krdipc_u:801: gup gopana-kutsanayoḥ ajñātatvena viṣayīkarotīti vyutpattyā mahad-ādi-pṛthivy-antaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:802: mahat-tattvādi-pṛthivī-paryantaṃ sakalaṃ kārya-jātaṃ jana ucyate // KrdC_2.15 //
GR14krdipc_u:804: vallabha ity upadiṣṭaṃ sāndrānandaṃ nirañjanaṃ jyotiḥ // Krd_2.16 //
GR14krdipc_u:806: yaḥ kārya-kāraṇeśaḥ paramātmety acyutaikatāsya manoḥ // Krd_2.17 //
GR14krdipc_u:807: anayoḥ gopī-janayor avidyā tat-kāryayoḥ samīraṇād antaryāmitvena svasya kārye preraṇād
GR14krdipc_u:808: niyamanādi iti yāvad āśrayatvato adhiṣṭhātṛtvena vyāptyā vyāpakatvena vallabhaḥ svāmīty
GR14krdipc_u:814: nirañjanaṃ māyā-kāluṣya-rahitaṃ svāheti tasmai sva-tejase sva-prakāśa-cid-rūpāya
GR14krdipc_u:815: paramātmane svātmānaṃ jīvaika-svarūpaṃ gamayāmi samarpayāmi tad-ātmakatāṃ prāpayāmīti svāhā-śabdārthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:819: yaḥ kārya-kāraṇayor jana-prakṛtyor īśaḥ svāmī adhiṣṭhātā tathā paramātmā nirupādhi-caitanyatvāc cety
GR14krdipc_u:823: tasya svānanyasya svāmī vallabha iti ha nirdiṣṭaḥ // Krd_2.18 //
GR14krdipc_u:824: athavā gopījana iti śabdena sakala-viśva-rakṣaṇa-śakti-samudāyaḥ kathyate /
GR14krdipc_u:827: tasya śakti-samūhasya svānanyasya svābhinnasya śakti-śaktimator abheda-vivakṣayā svāmī niyantā āśrayo vallabha iti hasya sphuṭaṃ nirdiṣṭa udita ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:829: laghu-dīpikā-kāras tu-avana-śakti-samudāyaḥ avanaṃ sthitiḥ tatra kāraṇa-bhūtānāṃ śaktīnāṃ samudāyaḥ samūhaḥ jagat-pāliny-ādi-gaṇaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:830: uktaṃ ca mahadbhiḥ jagat-pālinīty ādyāḥ proktās tāḥ sthitaye kalā iti tasya svāmī nāyaka ity arthaḥ // KrdC_2.18 //
GR14krdipc_u:832: athavā vraja-yuvatīnāṃ dayitāya juhomi māṃ madīyam
GR14krdipc_u:833: apīty arpayet samastaṃ brahmaṇi sugaṇe samasta-sampattyai // Krd_2.19 //
GR14krdipc_u:834: gopī-jano gopāṅganā-janas tasya vallabho niratiśaya-prema-viṣayaḥ tasmai vraja-yuvatīnāṃ gopa-ramaṇīnāṃ dayitāya hṛdayānanda-dāyine svāhā juhomi
GR14krdipc_u:835: kiṃ māṃ svātmānaṃ madīyam api ātmīya-suhṛd-ādikam api ity anena prakāreṇa sa-guṇe brahmaṇi saṃsāra-pravartake parameśvareśvare sarvaṃ samarpayet
GR14krdipc_u:837: aṣṭādaśākṣara-mantroddhārāya tad-antarbhūtau kṛṣṇa-govinda-śabdau prathamato vivicya darśayati-kṛṣ-śabda iti /
GR14krdipc_u:848: kṛṣ sattāyām ity atra kvib-antaḥ sattā-vācaka iti kāścit /
GR14krdipc_u:849: kṛṭ ṇaś ca ṇa-kāraś ca ānandātmaka ānanda-vācī /
GR14krdipc_u:850: nanda ānanda iti dhātor eka-deśa-grahaṇād iti kaścit /
GR14krdipc_u:851: tato dvandve kṛte 'trādarśaṃ ādyaci-kṛte ca kṛṣṇaḥ sad-ānanda ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:852: prakārāntareṇa kṛṣṇa-śabdaṃ vyutpādayati bhakteti bhaktānām agha-karṣaṇāt pāpa-parimārjanāt kṛṣṇa ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:853: bhaktādi-karṣaṇād iti pāṭhe ādi-śabdenābhakta-grahaṇaṃ bhaktasya karṣaṇaṃ sva-sthāna-nayanam abhaktasya karṣaṇaṃ naraka-nayanam ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:855: kṛṣṇa-varṇa-śarīratvāt kṛṣṇaḥ mantramaya-śarīrasya vācya-vācakayor abhedena vivakṣayā /
GR14krdipc_u:858: go-śabdasya vācakatvāt jñāna-vācakatvāt tena jñānenopalabhyate prāpyate jñāyate iti govindaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:859: vid lābhe ity asya dhātoḥ prakārāntaram āha-vettīti /
GR14krdipc_u:862: gāṃ śabda-rāśiṃ śabda-samudāyaṃ mātṛkāṃ vettīti govindaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:864: athavā gāva indriyāṇi teṣāṃ vicāraṇād viśeṣeṣu prati-niyata-viṣayeṣu pravartanād govindaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:866: tathā ca śrutiḥ-paśavo div-pādaś catuṣpādaś ca iti /
GR14krdipc_u:867: teṣāṃ viśeṣeṣu puṇya-pāpeṣu cāraṇāt pravartanād govindaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:868: athavā, gāvaḥ paśu-viśeṣāḥ teṣāṃ rakṣanād govindaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:875: ete abhikhye nāmanī kṛṣṇa-govindākhye anukrameṇa turya-vibhaktyā pratyekaṃ caturthī-vibhaktyā
GR14krdipc_u:876: saha mantrāt pūrvokta-daśākṣara-gopāla-mantrād ādau manmatha-bījāt paścāt kāma-bījānantaram
GR14krdipc_u:877: atha ced yadi syātāṃ bhavataḥ tadā eṣo 'ṣṭādaśārṇo mantra-śreṣṭho bhavati /
GR14krdipc_u:878: etasya balād eva daśākṣare 'pi kāma-bīja-sāhityaṃ kecid icchanti /
GR14krdipc_u:884: pūrva-pradiṣṭe muni-devate 'sya chandas tu gāyatram uśanti santaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:885: aṅgāni mantrārṇa-catuṣkair varmāvasānāni yugārṇam astram // Krd_2.23 //
GR14krdipc_u:886: asya mantrasya pūrva-pradiṣṭe prathama-mantra-sambandhitayā kathite muni-devate boddhavye /
GR14krdipc_u:888: aṅgānīti mantrārṇa-catuś catuṣkair mantra-sambandhi-varṇānāṃ caturbhiś caturbhir akṣaraiḥ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśākṣarair varmāvasānāni kavacāntāni catvāry aṅgāni bhavanti /
GR14krdipc_u:889: avaśiṣṭaṃ yugārṇam varṇa-dvayam astrākhyam aṅgaṃ bhavati /
GR14krdipc_u:890: prayogaś ca-klīṃ kṛṣṇāya hṛdayāya namaḥ govindāya śirase svāhā,
GR14krdipc_u:895: bījaṃ śaktiḥ prakṛtir viniyogaś cāpi pūrvavad amuṣya /
GR14krdipc_u:896: pūrvatarasya manorathaṃ kathayāmi nyāsam akhila-siddhi-karam // Krd_2.24 //
GR14krdipc_u:897: amuṣyāsya mantrasya bījaṃ śaktiḥ prakṛtir viniyogaḥ pūrva-mantre yāni bījādīni kathitāni tāny atrāpi jñātavyānīty arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:898: pūrvatarasyeti athānantaraṃ pūrvatarasya manor daśākṣara-gopāla-mantrasyākhila-siddhi-karaṃ samasta-siddhi-dāyakaṃ nyāsaṃ kathayāmīti pratijñā
GR14krdipc_u:904: atho 'nantaraṃ budhena paṇḍitena varṇair mūla-mantrākṣarair nyāso vidheyaḥ kāryaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:905: kiṃ kṛtvā ? mūla-mantraṃ hastayor antar madhye tathā hastayor eva bāhye pṛṣṭhe tathā hastayor eva pārśve vyāpayya vyāpakatayā vinyasyety arthaḥ
GR14krdipc_u:910: bindūttaṃsair binduḥ śiro 'laṅkāro yeṣāṃ te tathā sānusvārair ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:912: hārda-hṛdyair hārdena namaḥ-padena hṛdyair manojñaiḥ sahitair ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:913: prayogaś ca-oṃ goṃ oṃ namaḥ dakṣāṅguṣṭha-parva-traye oṃ pīṃ oṃ namaḥ tarjanyām ity ādi /
GR14krdipc_u:914: oṃ llaṃ oṃ namo vāma-kaniṣṭhikāyām ity ādi // KrdC_2.25 //
GR14krdipc_u:916: śākhāsu trīṇi parvāṇy adhi daśasu pṛthag-dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭha-pūrvaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:917: vāmāṅgaṣṭhāvasānaṃ nyasatu vimala-dhīḥ sṛṣṭir uktā karasthā /
GR14krdipc_u:919: dakṣāṅguṣṭhāntikaitat trayam api sṛjati sthity-upetaṃ ca kāryam // Krd_2.26 //
GR14krdipc_u:920: daśasu śākhāsu aṅgulīṣu pṛthak kṛtvaikaṃ trīṇi parvāṇi adhi parva-trayaṃ vyāpya,
GR14krdipc_u:921: tripāṭhinas tu trīṇi parvāṇi iti parva-traye adhīti upari aṅguly-agre ca pṛthag ekaikaśaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:922: tathā ca prathama-parvaṇi oṃ dvitīye oṃ tṛtīye oṃ aṅguly-agre namaḥ iti evam anyatrāpīty āhuḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:923: dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭha-pūrvaṃ prathama-nyāsādau yathā syāt tathā vāmāṅgaṣṭhāvasānaṃ vāmāṅgaṣṭho 'vasāne nyāsānte yathā syād evaṃ viśada-dhīr vimala-buddhīr nyasatu /
GR14krdipc_u:924: evaṃ ca karasthā sṛṣṭir uktā kare sṛṣṭi-nyāsa-prakāra ukta ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:926: vinyasya vāma-kare 'py aṅguṣṭhādika-niṣṭhāsv aṅguliṣu nyased ayaṃ sthiti-nyāsa uktaḥ / saṃhṛtir
GR14krdipc_u:927: vāma-pūrvā dakṣeti saṃhṛtiḥ saṃhāraḥ vāmāṅguṣṭha-pūrvā dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhāvasānā ayaṃ ca saṃhāra-nyāsa uktaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:928: etat trayam api sṛṣṭi-sthiti-saṃhārātmakaṃ trayam api sṛjati sthity-upetaṃ kāryaṃ ca sṛṣṭy-ādi-nyāsa-pañcakaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ // KrdC_2.26
GR14krdipc_u:931: tad-aṅga-pañcakaṃ tathā vidhiḥ samīritaḥ kare // Krd_2.27 //
GR14krdipc_u:932: tatas tad-anantaraṃ sthiti-kramāt sthiti-nyāsa-krameṇa daśasv aṅgulīṣu budhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ daśāṅgakāni pūrvokta-mantra-daśāṅgāni vinyaset /
GR14krdipc_u:933: tad-aṅga-pañcakaṃ tatheti tathā tena prakāreṇa sthiti-krameṇa tad-aṅga-pañcakaṃ purvokta-pañcakaṃ pūrvoktāṅga-pañcakaṃ daśasu aṅgulīṣu vinyaset
GR14krdipc_u:935: evaṃ cāyaṃ vidhiḥ prakāraḥ kare hasta-dvaye samīritaḥ kathita ity arthaḥ // KrdC_2.27 //
GR14krdipc_u:936: mātṛkā-nyāsa-viśeṣaṃ darśayan tattva-nyāsaṃ ca krameṇāha-puṭitair iti /
GR14krdipc_u:941: athāntara-manunā daśārṇena puṭitair mātṛkākṣaraiḥ sa-bindubhiḥ sānusvāraiḥ purovat
GR14krdipc_u:942: pūrvavad yathā pūrvaṃ lalāṭādiṣu nyāsa evam abhivinyasya anu paścān mātṛkā-nyāsa-viśeṣa-karaṇānantaraṃ
GR14krdipc_u:946: tatrāha-saṃhṛti-sṛṣṭi-mārga-bhedāt prathamaṃ saṃhāra-krameṇa tad-anantaraṃ sṛṣṭi-krameṇety arthaḥ // KrdC_2.28 //
GR14krdipc_u:952: asau manu-varyaḥ manu-śreṣṭhaḥ saṃhṛtau saṃhāra-nyāse anugato yathaivāsti tathaiva sṛṣṭi-mārge sṛṣṭi-kara-nyāse pratiyāto bhavet tad-viparīto bhavet /
GR14krdipc_u:954: eṣāṃ tattvānāṃ khalu niścayena uddhṛtir uddhāraḥ pūrvoktavad yathā pūrvam ukta-tattva-nyāse /
GR14krdipc_u:955: naty-upetaṃ bhūyaḥ parāya ca tad-āhvayam ātmane ca naty-antam uddharatu tattva-manūn krameṇa iti prakāreṇety arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:956: adhunā nyāsaṃ kathayāmīti sāmprataṃ nyāsa-sambandhi-tattva-nāma-kathanaṃ tat-sthāna-kathanaṃ ca karomīty arthaḥ // KrdC_2.29 //
GR14krdipc_u:959: punaḥ prakṛti-puruṣau para imāni tattvāny atha /
GR14krdipc_u:960: padāndhu-hṛdayāsyakāny adhi tu pañca madhye dvayaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:961: trayaṃ sakala-gaṃ tato nyasatu tad-viparyāsataḥ // Krd_2.30 //
GR14krdipc_u:970: paraś ca imāni pṛthivy-ādīni tattvāni tattva-pada-vācyāni /
GR14krdipc_u:978: adhi saptamy-arthe madhye hṛdaye tattva-dvayaṃ trayaṃ sakala-gaṃ sakalāṅga-vyāpakaṃ tatas tad-anantaraṃ tad-viparyāsataḥ ukta-saṃhāra-viparīta-rītyā nyasatu /
GR14krdipc_u:979: prayogaś ca-oṃ goṃ namaḥ parāya pṛthivy-ātmane namaḥ iti pāda-dvaye ity ārabhya oṃ
GR14krdipc_u:980: hāṃ namaḥ parāya paramātmane namaḥ ity antaḥ saṃhāraḥ oṃ hāṃ namaḥ parāya paramātmane
GR14krdipc_u:982: goṃ namaḥ parāya pṛthivy-ātmane namaḥ pāda-dvaye iti sṛṣṭi-nyāsaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:986: kecit tu tattva-padāntar-bhāvena nyāsam icchanti tac cintyam // KrdC_2.30 //
GR14krdipc_u:989: kāryo 'nyṣv api sadbhir gopāla-manuṣu jhaṭiti phala-siddhyai // Krd_2.31 //
GR14krdipc_u:990: ayaṃ proktaḥ kathito nyāsaḥ sadbhiḥ paṇḍitaiḥ anyeṣv api gopāla-mantreṣu uddhṛta-daśākṣara-vyatirikteṣv api kāryaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:993: tattva-daśaka-parikptaḥ tattvānāṃ daśakaṃ tattva-daśakaṃ tena parikpta udghāṭita ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:994: kim artham ? jhaṭiti phala-siddhyai śīghra-phala-prāptyai // KrdC_2.31 //
GR14krdipc_u:1000: athānantaraṃ dorbhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ dhruva-puṭitam praṇava-puṭitaṃ manu-varaṃ mantra-śreṣṭhaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:1001: daśākṣaraṃ gopāla-mantram ākeśād āpādaṃ keśādi-pāda-paryantaṃ triśaḥ sva-dehe vinyased
GR14krdipc_u:1003: eteṣāṃ mata ākeśād āpādad iti pāṭhaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1007: mūrdhni cakṣuṣor ubhaya-netre ekam evākṣaraṃ śrutayoḥ karṇayoḥ atrāpy -ekam eva ghrāṇe nāsā-yugme tatrāpy ekam eva mukhaṃ hṛdayaṃ jaṭharaṃ śivaṃ liṅgam jānu-dvaye ekaṃ,
GR14krdipc_u:1008: pāda-dvaye ekam eteṣu daśasu sthāneṣu daśākṣarāṇi
GR14krdipc_u:1010: uktā sṛṣṭiḥ śiṣṭair eṣā sthitir api
GR14krdipc_u:1013: viracayec ca sṛṣṭim anu sthitim // Krd_2.33 //
GR14krdipc_u:1014: śiṣṭair āgama-jñair eṣā sṛṣṭir uktety arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1015: sthitir api sthiti-nyāso 'pi munibhir nāradādibhir hṛdayādi-mukhāntikā abhihitā hṛdayam ārabhya mukha-paryantaṃ kathitā /
GR14krdipc_u:1017: tatra mantrākṣarāṇi pratilomena deyānītīdaṃ tritayaṃ viracayatu anu paścād etat tritaya-karaṇānantaraṃ punaḥ sṛṣṭim sthitim ca viracayatu /
GR14krdipc_u:1018: tathā ca pañca nyāsāḥ kāryā ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1019: prayogas tu goṃ namaḥ pīṃ namaḥ ity ādi //33//
GR14krdipc_u:1020: yeṣām āśramiṇāṃ yad-anto nyāsas tad darśayati -nyāsa iti /
GR14krdipc_u:1022: sthity-anto gṛhamedhiṣu sṛṣṭy-anto varṇinām iti prāhuḥ // Krd_2.34 //
GR14krdipc_u:1023: ayaṃ nyāsaḥ maskari-vaikhānaseṣu saṃhārānto vihitaḥ maskarī sannyāsī vaikhānaso vānaprasthaḥ,
GR14krdipc_u:1024: tathā tābhyāṃ nyāsa-trayaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1025: gṛha-medhiṣu gṛhastheṣu ayaṃ nyāsaḥ sthity-anto vihitaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1026: tathā gṛhasthaiḥ pañca nyāsāḥ kāryā ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1027: varṇināṃ brahmacāriṇām ayaṃ nyāsaḥ sṛṣṭy-anto vihitaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1028: tathā ca brahmacāribhir nyāsa-catuṣṭayaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1029: iti pūrvoktam artha-jātaṃ prāhuḥ prācīnā āgamajñā iti śeṣaḥ // KrdC_2.34 //
GR14krdipc_u:1031: vairāgya-yuji gṛhasthe saṃhāraṃ kecid āhur ācāryāḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1032: sahajānau vana-vāsini sthitiṃ ca vidyārthināṃ sṛṣṭim // Krd_2.35 //
GR14krdipc_u:1033: kecid ācāryāḥ vairāgya-yukta-gṛhasthe saṃhārāntaṃ nyāsam āhuḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1034: kiṃ ca sahajānau vana-vāsini sapatnīke sthitiṃ sthity-antaṃ nyāsam āhuḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1035: tathā brahmacāri-bhinnānāṃ vidyārthinām api sṛṣṭim sṛṣṭy-antaṃ nyāsam āhur ity arthaḥ // KrdC_2.35 //
GR14krdipc_u:1039: nasi ca vadane sarvāḥ sajyāyasī hṛdi tarjanī
GR14krdipc_u:1040: prathamaja-yutā madhyā nābhau śravo-vihitā śive // Krd_2.36 //
GR14krdipc_u:1041: tā evāṅgulayo jānvoḥ sāṅguṣṭhās tu pada-dvaye /
GR14krdipc_u:1042: sthānārṇayor vinimayo bhaven nāsty aṅguli-sthānayoḥ // Krd_2.37 //
GR14krdipc_u:1043: madhyā madhyāṅguliḥ śirasi mūrdhni vihitā nyāsa-karaṇatvena tathā madhyāṅgulyā nyāsaḥ śirasi kārya ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1045: tathā ca madhyamā-tarjanībhyām akṣṇor nyāsaḥ kāryaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1046: śravasi śrotra-yugale rahitāṅguṣṭhā aṅguṣṭha-rahitā sarvāṅgulayo vihitāḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1047: nasi nāsā-yugale jyeṣṭhānvitā aṅguṣṭha-yuktā upakaniṣṭhakā anāmikā vihitā /
GR14krdipc_u:1050: nābhau jaṭhare nābhi-padena jaṭharam upalakṣitam iti vidyādharaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1053: śive liṅge tathā vihitā yathā jaṭhare sāṅguṣṭhā madhyā
GR14krdipc_u:1055: śravo vihitā śiva iti pāṭhe śrotra-yugale yā aṅguṣṭha-rahitās tāḥ śive vihitā ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1056: jānvos tā evāṅgulayaḥ aṅguṣṭhena rahitāḥ sarvāṅgulaya ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1058: sthānārṇayor ity ādinā sthānaākṣaraayor vinimayo viparyayo bhavati /
GR14krdipc_u:1063: kintu sṛṣṭau sthitau saṃhṛtau vā yatra sthāne yāṅgulir vihitā tayaivāṅgulyā tatra stāne nyāsaḥ kārya ity arthaḥ / // KrdC_2.36-37 //
GR14krdipc_u:1067: aparaṃ bhūty-abhidhaṃ bhūtir iti nāma yasya tad bhūti-nāmakaṃ vacmi kathayāmi /
GR14krdipc_u:1076: tat-prācyādi-diśāsu mūrdhni sakale doṣṇoś ca sakthnos tathā // Krd_2.39 //
GR14krdipc_u:1085: kandharā ghāṭā kandharā kaṇṭha iti laghu-dīpikā-kāraḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1097: na iti nāsikā-dvayaṃ kapola-dvayam eteṣu tṛtīyā vṛttiḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1098: kara-padeti kara-padayoḥ pratyekaṃ sandhi-catuṣṭayaṃ sandhiṣv aṅguly-agreṣu aṅgulīṣu ca /
GR14krdipc_u:1101: vṛttiḥ / iti pakṣa-dvayaṃ ca vidyādharas tu karayor ekā vṛttiḥ,
GR14krdipc_u:1108: ata eva hasta-pādayor nyāsa-catuṣṭayam iti tripāṭhinaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1109: ke mastaka-madhye tat-prācyādi-diśāsu mastaka-pūrvādi-caturdikṣu sakale mūrdhni sakale
GR14krdipc_u:1110: mastake prādakṣiṇyena vyāpakatayā doṣṇoś ca bāhu-yuge tathā sakthnor ūru-mūlasyādhiṣṭhānayor
GR14krdipc_u:1135: ittham anena prakāreṇa manūtthān mantra-sambandhino varṇān nyaset /
GR14krdipc_u:1138: jaṃ namaḥ nābhau ity ādi // KrdC_2.39-40 //
GR14krdipc_u:1146: punar nara-taruṇī-mano-rañjanaṃ puruṣa-nārī-cittāhlādakaṃ na kevalaṃ sarvānurañjanam /

GR14krdipc_u:3812: madhye varṇān daśānāṃ daśa-lipi-manu-varyasya caikekaśo 'bjam // Krd_5.87 //
GR14krdipc_u:3813: daśa-dala-padmaṃ vilikhya karṇikāyāṃ ṣaṭ-koṇaṃ vahni-gṛhaṃ vilikhya vahni-gṛha-yugmasya madhye ṣaṭ-koṇeṣu vilikhet /
GR14krdipc_u:3814: lekhana-prakāram āha-karṇikāyāṃ madhye sādhya-nāma-sahitam amukasyāmukaṃ sidhyatv ity anena sahitaṃ kandarpaṃ kāma-bījaṃ vilikhet /
GR14krdipc_u:3815: tathā vivara-gataṃ ṣaḍ-arṇaṃ ṣaṭ-koṇa-gata-vakṣyamāṇa-ṣaḍ-akṣaraṃ vilikhet tathā
GR14krdipc_u:3816: keśareṣu daśa-dala-mūleṣu dviśaḥ dvau dvau kṛtvā dvi-nava-lipi-manor aṣṭādaśākṣara-mantrasya
GR14krdipc_u:3818: tathā daśānāṃ pātrāṇāṃ madhye daśa-lipi-manu-varyasya daśākṣara-mantra-śreṣṭhasya varṇān ekaikaśo vilikhet tato 'bjaṃ padmam // KrdC_5.87 //

GR14krdipc_u:3868: śālagrāme maṇau yantre maṇḍale pratimāsu ca /

GR14krdipc_u:6130: yad anu tatam ajasraṃ pāti cādhiṣṭhitā yam /
GR14krdipc_u:6131: yad uru maha udarcir yaṃ vidhatte ca gopī
GR14krdipc_u:6133: jagad idam anuviddham anusyūtaṃ yena jyotiṣā yasmāt parameśvarāt imaṃ jana-lokaṃ saṃsārākhyaṃ prasūte prasūtiṃ prānotīty arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:6135: tathā parameśvaram adhiṣṭhātāram āśritā satī anutataṃ vistṛtaṃ jagat ajasraṃ sarvadā
GR14krdipc_u:6136: pāti rakṣati yasya parameśvarasya ūru vipulaṃ mahaḥ tejaḥ tat udarcis tat-tejasā
GR14krdipc_u:6137: udita-dīptiḥ satī yaṃ pratibimba-rūpeṇa dhatte tam uktānandaṃ sva-prakāśaṃ naumi
GR14krdipc_u:6142: vande kāya-vimardanaṃ vadha-kṛtāṃ bhuñjad-dyukaṃ yādavam // Krd_8.116 //
GR14krdipc_u:6143: yaḥ parameśvaraḥ śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ vakṣyamāṇa-lakṣaṇaṃ cakraṃ dhatte taṃ vande ity anvayaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:6150: manmatha-śatruṇā mahā-devena avane avana-kṛte sarva-loka-rakṣārthaṃ dattam /
GR14krdipc_u:6154: pāpa-rahitaṃ svīkṛta-māyaṃ punar dhruvam avināśinaṃ punar vadha-kṛtām upadrava-kāriṇāṃ
GR14krdipc_u:6155: kāya-vimardanaṃ śarīra-nāśakaṃ punaḥ bhuñjad-dyukaṃ bhuñjat-svarga-lokaṃ punar jātyāyād avam ity arthaḥ
GR14krdipc_u:6156: / atra padye cakra-bandhe grantha-kartā sva-nāma prakṣiptavān iti bodhyam // KrdC_8.116 //
